class_notes:
(Same as DANC 336 1)
(Permission Required)
Email Sally Radell (sradell@emory.edu) for a permission number. Please indicate your current major(s) or major/minor in your email.
course_description: This course is designed for dancers, movers, and aspiring movement practitioners to develop a deeper anatomical understanding of the body and to explore anatomical relationships through movement, somatic practices, and neuromuscular exercises.
sections: Class Nbr: 3756, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: E. Faulkner, Status: Open
